title: CLASSIC Esthetics & Spa
welcome: A space in Barcelona dedicated to care and beauty.

services.title: Services

classicCleaning.title: Classic Facial Cleaning – 1 hour
classicCleaning.description: The skin on your face is always exposed… removes dead cells, hydrates, and brightens. Includes makeup removal, toner, exfoliation, steam, extraction, serum, mask, and facial massage.

classicHydration.title: Classic Facial Hydration – 1 hour
classicHydration.description: Intensive treatment to restore hydration, freshness, and vitality to the skin. Ideal for dry or dull skin. Steps: cleansing, exfoliation, mask, facial massage, and final serum.

hydraGloss.title: Hydra Gloss Lips – 45 min
hydraGloss.description: Hydrates, regenerates, and enhances the natural volume of the lips. Gloss effect with visible results from the first session.

liftingEyelashes.title: Women - Lash Lift & Tint – 50 min
liftingEyelashes.description: The lift will lengthen and curl your lashes, and the tint will add color, as if you were always wearing mascara. The perfect solution to highlight your eyes.

relaxing.title: Classic Relaxing Massage – 1 hour
relaxing.description: Balance body and mind. Ideal for relieving tension, stress, and fatigue. Full body treatment with aromatic oils.

facialLifting.title: Classic Facial Lifting Massage – 50 min
facialLifting.description: Firming massage that stimulates collagen, improves circulation, and helps prevent fine lines.

lymphaticDrainage.title: Lymphatic Drainage – 1 hour
lymphaticDrainage.description: Stimulates the lymphatic system, reduces fluid retention, and improves circulation. Ideal for tired legs or after long trips.

footSpa.title: Foot Spa – 40 min
footSpa.description: Ideal for those who spend long hours standing or want a moment of relaxation and care.

magicSculpt.title: Magic Sculpt Detox – 1h 15min
magicSculpt.description: Comprehensive treatment that activates circulation, reduces measurements, and eliminates toxins. Visible results from the first session.

classicSPA.title: Classic SPA – 1h 30min
classicSPA.description: An exclusive ritual that combines deep relaxation, body exfoliation, and facial and body hydration. This treatment renews body and mind through aromatherapy, relaxing massage, and facial lifting care, leaving the skin soft, the face glowing, and a lasting sense of well-being. Perfect as a gift or complete self-care experience.

peelingHydration.title: Peeling + Body Hydration – 1h
peelingHydration.description: Deep cleansing that renews the skin, removes impurities, and leaves a soft and radiant texture.

services.note: ⚠️ All services are exclusively for women. Bookings that do not meet this requirement will be canceled.
